GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.17.2
GSD.description:
mptcp: Fix crash due to tcp_tsorted_anchor was initialized before release skb

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 4d54181eba4b077fb74033a7186898ad4000a7a5, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit f70cad1085d1e01d3ec73c1078405f906237feee. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mptcp: Fix crash due to tcp_tsorted_anchor was initialized before release skb
